thread.title: Standard & Poor’s lowers outlook on European Union to negative
thread.title_full: Standard & Poor’s lowers outlook on European Union to negative | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Standard & Poor’s lowers outlook on European Union to negative
text:
Other Articles US manufacturing growth slows in July Monsoon picture remains cloudy Parents disown IFC report on RBI monetary policy eve Standard & Poor’s Ratings Services lowered its outlook on the European Union to negative from stable as it expects that the EU would provide first-loss guarantee support for financing connected to the Juncker investment plan.
The ratings service said the outlook also reflects further downward pressure on the average weighted rating on budgetary contributors to the EU.
First Published on August 03, 2015 11:58 pm
